{"word":"mengecilkan","priority":"★★★","meanings":[{"part_of_speech":"verb","definition":"membuat menjadi kecil","english_definition":"to make smaller; to reduce in size, amount, or importance.","examples":[{"sentence":"Dia mencoba mengecilkan foto itu agar muat di halaman.","translation":"He tried to shrink the photo so it would fit on the page.","english_translation":"He tried to shrink the photo so it would fit on the page."},{"sentence":"Kita perlu mengecilkan anggaran pengeluaran kita.","translation":"We need to reduce our spending budget.","english_translation":"We need to reduce our spending budget."},{"sentence":"Jangan mengecilkan masalah ini, ini sangat serius.","translation":"Don't downplay this problem, it's very serious.","english_translation":"Don't downplay this problem, it's very serious."}],"collocations":["mengecilkan ukuran (reduce the size)","mengecilkan biaya (reduce costs)","mengecilkan masalah (downplay a problem)","mengecilkan risiko (reduce risk)"],"synonyms":["mengurangi","memperpendek","meringankan","meminimalkan"],"antonyms":["membesarkan","memperluas","meningkatkan","memperbesar"]},{"part_of_speech":"verb","definition":"meremehkan","english_definition":"to belittle; to underestimate; to treat as less important than it really is.","examples":[{"sentence":"Dia selalu mengecilkan pencapaian orang lain.","translation":"He always belittles other people's achievements.","english_translation":"He always belittles other people's achievements."},{"sentence":"Jangan biarkan siapapun mengecilkan impianmu.","translation":"Don't let anyone underestimate your dreams.","english_translation":"Don't let anyone underestimate your dreams."}],"collocations":["mengecilkan kemampuan (underestimate ability)","mengecilkan potensi (underestimate potential)","mengecilkan usaha (belittle effort)"],"synonyms":["meremehkan","menganggap enteng","memandang rendah"],"antonyms":["menghargai","menghormati","mengagumi"]}],"etymology":{"value":"Berasal dari kata dasar 'kecil' (small) dengan awalan 'meng-' dan akhiran '-kan' yang berfungsi untuk membentuk kata kerja transitif (transitive verb).","priority":"★★☆"},"pronunciation":{"ipa":"/məŋət͡ʃilkan/","syllables":"me-nge-cil-kan"},"inflection":{"notes":"Ini adalah kata kerja transitif, jadi membutuhkan objek. Bentuk dasarnya adalah 'kecil' (small)."},"usage_notes":{"explanation":"'Mengecilkan' memiliki dua makna utama: membuat sesuatu menjadi lebih kecil secara fisik atau kuantitatif, dan meremehkan atau menganggap sesuatu kurang penting dari yang sebenarnya. Konteks kalimat akan menentukan makna yang tepat.","priority":"★★★"},"common_mistakes":{"examples":[{"incorrect":"Saya mengecil karena sakit.","correct":"Berat badan saya mengecil karena sakit.","note":"'Mengecil' membutuhkan objek. Lebih tepat menggunakan 'Berat badan saya mengecil' (My weight decreased) daripada 'Saya mengecil' (I shrink)."},{"incorrect":"Dia mengecilkan saya di depan umum.","correct":"Dia meremehkan saya di depan umum.","note":"Jika maksudnya adalah 'belittle', kata yang lebih tepat adalah 'meremehkan' (belittle) daripada 'mengecilkan' (make smaller)."}],"priority":"★★☆"},"related_words":{"derivatives":["kecil (small)","pengecilan (reduction, downsizing)"],"phrasal_verbs":[],"compounds":["mengecilkan hati (to discourage)"]},"level_frequency":{"CEFR":"B1","frequency_google_ngram":"Cukup sering (Moderately frequent)","priority":"★☆☆"},"readability_explanation":{"level":"B1","text":"'Mengecilkan' berarti membuat sesuatu menjadi lebih kecil atau menganggap sesuatu tidak penting. Bayangkan Anda memiliki foto yang terlalu besar, Anda bisa 'mengecilkan' ukurannya agar muat. Atau, jika seseorang mengatakan masalah Anda tidak penting, mereka 'mengecilkan' masalah Anda. Perhatikan konteksnya untuk memahami arti yang tepat.","priority":"★★☆"},"example_sentences":[{"sentence":"Perusahaan itu harus mengecilkan jumlah karyawannya karena kerugian.","translation":"The company had to downsize its workforce due to losses.","english_translation":"The company had to downsize its workforce due to losses.","type":"verb","meaning_category":"membuat menjadi kecil"},{"sentence":"Dia mencoba mengecilkan perannya dalam proyek tersebut.","translation":"He tried to downplay his role in the project.","english_translation":"He tried to downplay his role in the project.","type":"verb","meaning_category":"meremehkan"},{"sentence":"Anda bisa mengecilkan gambar ini dengan mengklik tombol ini.","translation":"You can shrink this image by clicking this button.","english_translation":"You can shrink this image by clicking this button.","type":"verb","meaning_category":"membuat menjadi kecil"},{"sentence":"Jangan mengecilkan arti dari pendidikan.","translation":"Don't underestimate the importance of education.","english_translation":"Don't underestimate the importance of education.","type":"verb","meaning_category":"meremehkan"}]}
}
